data.text: Different people in different parts of the world have different beliefs about God and how we should conduct our lives on Earth. These beliefs are called religions.
Prophets were people chosen by God to whom He revealed His wishes and commands.
The followers of Islam are called Muslims. They believe in one God. The Quran is the holy book of Muslims.
Judaism is one of the oldest religions.
Christianity is based on the teachings of Jesus Christ.
Hindus worship God in many forms.
Sikhs follow the teachings of Guru Nanak and the nine gurus who came after him.
Buddhists follow the teachings of Gautama Buddha.
